title: Chasing Shadows
description: Quest are hard. Instructions are important. When Darian and his bond brothers set out on their mission to find the one person who can balance their bond, they learn they missed some crucial details. Now, as fighting breaks out between them, they must find the missing pieces of the puzzle before the darkness consumes Darian and drives him mad. Mad enough to destroy the world. Can they master their magic and finish their quest before it is too late? Pick up your copy and find out what happens. A prequel to Myths and Legends.
author: Sherry  Foster
